name: Engie South East Asia
description: Engie is a global energy company, whose SEA entity works towards low-carbon solutions. They focus on reducing consumption, energy-efficiency, renewables... with the help of smart solutions such as IoT. Engie SEA intervenes all along the value chain, from strategy and engineering, to operations management and outcome assurance. ENGIE bring knowledge and solutions in Design, Build, Management and Operation of mission-critical data centres that deliver significant gains in energy efficiency, reduction in cost and carbon emissions.
